titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation against the vnnecessary waste of gunpowder.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Contains illustrated initial depicting Neptune and two seahorses.
"Giuen at Our Court at Whitehall the tenth day of February, in the third yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
